Agumon:defaultDigivice.NAME: Digivice
Agumon:defaultDigivice.FLAVOR: The medium that connects Digimon and humans.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #yagumon:courage. NL At the start of each combat after clearing the Act 1 boss, there is a 60% chance to obtain the #yCrest #yOf #yCourage.

Agumon:CrestOfCourage.NAME: Crest of Courage
DESCRIPTIONS: If agumon has Crest, he can digivolve beyond a Ultimate.

Agumon:Ruby.NAME: Ruby Gemstone
Agumon:Ruby.FLAVOR: Ruby picked up from the edge of a cliff
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b250 #yGold. At the start of battle, gain 4 Block.

Agumon:BlueDragonPower.NAME: Power of Qinglongmon
Agumon:BlueDragonPower.FLAVOR: Qinglongmon shared power for The DigiDestined Child
DESCRIPTIONS: You can only use when #yagumon:level is Rookie and battle with Elite or Boss. You can Warp Digivolve to Mega.

Agumon:HolyRing.NAME: Holly Ring
Agumon:HolyRing.FLAVOR: This is the Holy Ring held by the Holy Digimon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 4 cards, heal 1 HP.

Agumon:HolyPower.NAME: Holy Power
Agumon:HolyPower.FLAVOR: It is the Power received from the holy Digimon. The light gets stronger as it digivolve.

Agumon:DramonKiller.NAME: Dramon Killer
Agumon:DramonKiller.FLAVOR: It is an unusual weapon that reacts strongly to certain enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you are an elite or boss room, gain #b3 #yStrength at the start of the battle.
